title: Chicken and Vegetable Pasties
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '275g cooked chicken, roughly chopped', '300g frozen peas, carrots and sweetcorn mix', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '125ml soured cream', '4 tablespoons grated Cheddar cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '4 sheets puff pastry']
